name: Bone Shard Fusion
body:
**Source** Alec Ellsworth
-
Target(s) Up to six Ashen Bone Shards in your right hand.
You fuse all of the target Ashen Bone Shards with Aposyntheto, consuming the all of the target Ashen Bone Shards, raising Aposyntheto's Shard Points by the same number of the target Ashen Bone Shards.
